item.title: Leaves and rubbish not fixed for months, 31st December
item.description:
Leaves , weeds along the pavements on the green between westhorne Avenue and rancliffe gardens not picked up for months Rubbish flytipped on lawn simply thrown to pavement and kicked against walls of homes to disappear int leaves its piled up for months
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Westhorne Avenue, Eltham

item.title: Manhole cover os 53 Mount Road end of Mount Drive, 31st December
item.description:
The manhole cover is broken as it makes a loud clunking noise every time a vehicle drives over it. Please can this be fixed with a matter of urgency as it is keeping residents awake at night. This has been reported before and the case was closed but the issue has not been fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mount Road, Blendon, Greater London

item.description:

item.title: Fly-tipping (furniture) and accumulated waste at Courtyard House, SE16 2AH, 31st December
item.description:
Hi, I am writing to report ongoing fly-tipping and waste accumulation at Courtyard House, SE16 2AH (exact pinpoint on the map). Residents of Courtyard House and the neighbouring Nordic Court have been experiencing daily build-ups of waste in this area. For several weeks, discarded furniture parts and a mattress have been left there, and we are unsure how to have them removed. More generally, the street conditions in this part of the neighbourhood are poor in terms of cleanliness. The bin area for Courtyard House cannot be properly closed, and because of the large amount of furniture and waste accumulated, it appears that passers-by are also leaving rubbish there. For this reason, I believe this situation goes beyond normal household waste and should be treated as fly-tipping. I would be grateful if the situation could be improved and if the mattress and furniture could be removed. Many thanks for your help.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rotherhithe New Road, Rotherhithe, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
